description: This file defines a layout component for a Qwik-based frontend application, including route handling logic, UI structure with sidebar and main content area, and mock data for notes.

methods.name: onGet
methods.description: Handles GET requests for the route, setting cache control headers.

methods.name: default
methods.description: The main layout component rendering the app's structure including TopBar, NoteList, and Slot for nested routes.
